title: Flights & Flatbread with PEJU Winery
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 4, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a Flights & Flatbread evening featuring the elegant, estate-driven wines of PEJU Winery, with a curated lineup from their Legacy Collection and a special guest host.

Tasting Fee: $35 (includes a flatbread and a tasting)

Reserve your Spot

Featured Wines:

• PEJU Legacy Collection Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 94 pts Decanter – A full-bodied Napa Cabernet layered with spiced plum, black cherry, mocha, violets, and supple, elongated tannins with a cool slate-driven finish.

• PEJU Legacy Collection Merlot 2022 – A polished and energetic Merlot offering ripe plum, black cherry, forest herbs, subtle spice, and fine chalky tannins on a bright, racy finish.

• PEJU Legacy Collection Chardonnay 2023 – 92 pts James Suckling – Expressive and creamy with lemon curd, green apple, citrus cream, vanilla bean, and a silky, mineral-laced finish.

• PEJU Legacy Collection Sauvignon Blanc 2024 – 90 pts James Suckling – Vibrant and aromatic with pineapple, peach, dried pear, and a crisp, refreshing palate that carries through to a long finish.

Enjoy an evening of thoughtfully crafted Napa Valley wines paired with flatbread in a relaxed, social setting—a perfect midweek escape for wine lovers.
